sense.gloss: to be caught in, to be stuck in
to stop by, to drop in for a short visit, to be delayed, to take time
to get mixed up in (trouble), to get entangled in (a problem), to be involved with
to fall for (a trick), to be deceived, to be cheated
to be on one's mind, to worry one, to be bothered by, to feel uneasy
to be obstructed, to be hindered

sdata.j: そんなのに↑引↑↓|ひ↓っかかる|のは↑間抜↑↓まぬ↓けだよ。
↑何↑↓なん↓でそんな↑安↑↓やす↓っぽいペテンに|ひっかかる|んだ。
sdata.e: Why do people get fooled by such cheap schemes?

sdata.j: こういった↑場所↑↓ばしょ↓に↑引↑↓|ひ↓っかかる|のは、↑一体↑↓いったい↓どういった↑種類↑↓しゅるい↓の↑人↑↓ひと↓たちなんだろう？
sdata.e: What sort of people hang out at a place like this?

sdata.j: このファスナー、↑引↑↓|ひ↓っかかる|んだ。
